languages.text: Чтобы атаковать, выберите иконку одиночного выстрела на панели оружия. Наведите курсор на противника — на всплывающей панели будет указан шанс попадания и возможный урон в случае успешной атаки. Нажмите [ЛКМ] на противнике, чтобы выстрелить. Урон зависит от параметров выбранного оружия. Также на эффективность выстрела влияет дистанция — при наведении одиночного выстрела вы увидите две области с эффективной и максимальной дальностью стрельбы.

To attack, first click [LMB] on the {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}single shot{/g} icon on the weapons panel at the bottom of the screen. Hover the cursor over an enemy — a tooltip will appear showing your chances of {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hitting{/g} that enemy and the possible damage you can deal on a successful hit. Click [LMB] on the enemy to fire. The amount of damage your characters deal depends on the parameters of the weapon they are using. The effectiveness of the shot depends on the distance between the character and their enemy — when you target an enemy with a single shot, you will see two areas denoting the weapon's effective and maximum firing {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranges{/g}.
languages.original_text: Чтобы атаковать, выберите иконку одиночного выстрела на панели оружия. Урон зависит от параметров выбранного оружия. Также на эффективность выстрела влияет дистанция — при наведении одиночного выстрела вы увидите две области с эффективной и максимальной дальностью стрельбы.

traits.locale_text: To attack, first click [LMB] on the {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}single shot{/g} icon on the weapons panel at the bottom of the screen. Hover the cursor over an enemy — a tooltip will appear showing your chances of {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}hitting{/g} that enemy and the possible damage you can deal on a successful hit. Click [LMB] on the enemy to fire. The amount of damage your characters deal depends on the parameters of the weapon they are using. The effectiveness of the shot depends on the distance between the character and their enemy — when you target an enemy with a single shot, you will see two areas denoting the weapon's effective and maximum firing {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranges{/g}.

languages.text: 若要进行攻击，首先鼠标左键屏幕底部武器面板上的{g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}单发射击{/g}图标。将鼠标悬停在敌人头上，弹出的窗口会显示{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}目标的几率，以及成功命中之后可能造成的伤害。按下鼠标左键，即可向敌人开火。 角色造成的伤害，取决于角色装备武器的属性。射击效果的有效程度，取决于您的角色与敌人之间的距离。当您瞄准敌人进行单发射击时，您会看到两片区域，分别代表武器的有效{g|Encyclopedia:Range}射程{/g}与武器的最大射程。
languages.original_text: To attack, first click [LMB] on the {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}single shot{/g} icon on the weapons panel at the bottom of the screen. Hover the cursor over an enemy — a tooltip will appear showing your chances of {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hitting{/g} that enemy and the possible damage you can deal on a successful hit. Click [LMB] on the enemy to fire. The amount of damage your characters deal depends on the parameters of the weapon they are using. The effectiveness of the shot depends on the distance between the character and their enemy — when you target an enemy with a single shot, you will see two areas denoting the weapon's effective and maximum firing {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranges{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 若要进行攻击，首先鼠标左键屏幕底部武器面板上的{g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}单发射击{/g}图标。将鼠标悬停在敌人头上，弹出的窗口会显示{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}目标的几率，以及成功命中之后可能造成的伤害。按下鼠标左键，即可向敌人开火。 角色造成的伤害，取决于角色装备武器的属性。射击效果的有效程度，取决于您的角色与敌人之间的距离。当您瞄准敌人进行单发射击时，您会看到两片区域，分别代表武器的有效{g|Encyclopedia:Range}射程{/g}与武器的最大射程。

languages.text: 画面下の武器パネルにある{g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}単発射撃{/g}アイコンの上で [LMB] をクリックすると、単発の射撃攻撃ができる。敵にカーソルを合わせるとツールチップが表示され、その敵に{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}する確率と、命中したときに与える可能性のあるダメージを確認できる。敵の上で [LMB] をクリックすると発射する。 キャラクターが与えるダメージ量は、使用する武器のパラメータによって変わる。射撃の効果は、キャラクターと敵の距離によって変わる。単発射撃の標的として敵に照準を当てると、武器の有効射程と最大{g|Encyclopedia:Range}射程{/g}を示す2つのエリアが表示される。
languages.original_text: To attack, first click [LMB] on the {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}single shot{/g} icon on the weapons panel at the bottom of the screen. Hover the cursor over an enemy — a tooltip will appear showing your chances of {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hitting{/g} that enemy and the possible damage you can deal on a successful hit. Click [LMB] on the enemy to fire. The amount of damage your characters deal depends on the parameters of the weapon they are using. The effectiveness of the shot depends on the distance between the character and their enemy — when you target an enemy with a single shot, you will see two areas denoting the weapon's effective and maximum firing {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranges{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 画面下の武器パネルにある{g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}単発射撃{/g}アイコンの上で [LMB] をクリックすると、単発の射撃攻撃ができる。敵にカーソルを合わせるとツールチップが表示され、その敵に{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}する確率と、命中したときに与える可能性のあるダメージを確認できる。敵の上で [LMB] をクリックすると発射する。 キャラクターが与えるダメージ量は、使用する武器のパラメータによって変わる。射撃の効果は、キャラクターと敵の距離によって変わる。単発射撃の標的として敵に照準を当てると、武器の有効射程と最大{g|Encyclopedia:Range}射程{/g}を示す2つのエリアが表示される。

languages.text: Para atacar, pulsa el [botón izquierdo del ratón] sobre el icono de {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}ataque de un solo disparo{/g} en el panel de armas situado en la parte inferior de la pantalla. Mantén el cursor sobre un enemigo para que aparezca un mensaje que detallará tus probabilidades de {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impactar{/g} en dicho enemigo y el posible daño que ejerza un impacto con éxito. Pulsa el [botón izquierdo del ratón] sobre el enemigo para dispararle. La cantidad de daño que inflijan tus personajes depende de los parámetros del arma que utilicen. La efectividad del tiro varía según la distancia entre el personaje y su oponente. Cuando elijas como objetivo a un enemigo para un ataque de un solo tiro, aparecerán dos áreas que marcan los {g|Encyclopedia:Range}alcances{/g} de disparo efectivo y máximo.
languages.original_text: To attack, first click [LMB] on the {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}single shot{/g} icon on the weapons panel at the bottom of the screen. Hover the cursor over an enemy — a tooltip will appear showing your chances of {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hitting{/g} that enemy and the possible damage you can deal on a successful hit. Click [LMB] on the enemy to fire. The amount of damage your characters deal depends on the parameters of the weapon they are using. The effectiveness of the shot depends on the distance between the character and their enemy — when you target an enemy with a single shot, you will see two areas denoting the weapon's effective and maximum firing {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranges{/g}.

Mantén el cursor sobre un enemigo para que aparezca un mensaje que detallará tus probabilidades de {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}impactar{/g} en dicho enemigo y el posible daño que ejerza un impacto con éxito. Pulsa el [botón izquierdo del ratón] sobre el enemigo para dispararle. La cantidad de daño que inflijan tus personajes depende de los parámetros del arma que utilicen. La efectividad del tiro varía según la distancia entre el personaje y su oponente. Cuando elijas como objetivo a un enemigo para un ataque de un solo tiro, aparecerán dos áreas que marcan los {g|Encyclopedia:Range}alcances{/g} de disparo efectivo y máximo.

languages.text: Zum Angriff wählst du zuerst das {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}Einzelschuss{/g}-Symbol im Waffenfeld per [LMB]-Klick aus. Bewege den Cursor über einen Feind ... ein Tooltip zeigt dir an, wie hoch deine Chancen sind, den Gegner zu {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}treffen{/g}, und wie viel Schaden du ihm mit einem erfolgreichen Treffer zufügen kannst. Klicke zum Schießen mit [LMB] auf den Feind. Die Höhe des Schadens, den deine Charaktere verursachen, hängt von den Parametern der Waffen ab, die sie benutzen. Die Effektivität der Schüsse hängt von der Distanz zwischen den Charakteren und ihren Gegnern ab – wenn du einen Gegner mit einem Einzelschuss anvisierst, siehst du zwei Bereiche, die die effektive und maximale {g|Encyclopedia:Range}Reichweite{/g} der Waffe angeben.
languages.original_text: To attack, first click [LMB] on the {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}single shot{/g} icon on the weapons panel at the bottom of the screen. Hover the cursor over an enemy — a tooltip will appear showing your chances of {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hitting{/g} that enemy and the possible damage you can deal on a successful hit. Click [LMB] on the enemy to fire. The amount of damage your characters deal depends on the parameters of the weapon they are using. The effectiveness of the shot depends on the distance between the character and their enemy — when you target an enemy with a single shot, you will see two areas denoting the weapon's effective and maximum firing {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranges{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Zum Angriff wählst du zuerst das {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}Einzelschuss-{/g}Symbol im Waffenfeld per [LMB]-Klick aus. Bewege den Mauszeiger über einen Feind – ein Tooltip zeigt dir an, wie hoch deine Chancen sind, den Gegner zu {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}treffen{/g}, und wie viel Schaden du ihm bei einem erfolgreichen Treffer zufügen kannst. Klicke zum Schießen mit der [LMB] auf den Feind. Die Höhe des Schadens, den deine Charaktere verursachen, hängt von den Parametern der Waffen ab, die sie benutzen. Die Effektivität der Schüsse hängt von der Distanz zwischen den Charakteren und ihren Gegnern ab – wenn du einen Gegner mit einem Einzelschuss anvisierst, siehst du zwei Bereiche, die die effektive und maximale {g|Encyclopedia:Range}Reichweite{/g} der Waffe angeben.

Zum Angriff wählst du zuerst das {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}Einzelschuss{/g}-Symbol im Waffenfeld per [LMB]-Klick aus. Bewege den Cursor über einen Feind ... ein Tooltip zeigt dir an, wie hoch deine Chancen sind, den Gegner zu {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}treffen{/g}, und wie viel Schaden du ihm mit einem erfolgreichen Treffer zufügen kannst. Klicke zum Schießen mit [LMB] auf den Feind. Die Höhe des Schadens, den deine Charaktere verursachen, hängt von den Parametern der Waffen ab, die sie benutzen. Die Effektivität der Schüsse hängt von der Distanz zwischen den Charakteren und ihren Gegnern ab – wenn du einen Gegner mit einem Einzelschuss anvisierst, siehst du zwei Bereiche, die die effektive und maximale {g|Encyclopedia:Range}Reichweite{/g} der Waffe angeben.

languages.text: Pour attaquer, commencez par cliquer avec le [BGS] sur l'icône {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}attaque au coup par coup{/g} dans le panneau des armes en bas de l'écran. Passez le curseur sur un ennemi. Une infobulle s'affiche alors pour vous indiquer vos chances de {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}toucher{/g} cet ennemi et les dégâts possibles en cas de succès. Cliquez avec le [BGS] sur l'ennemi à attaquer. Les dégâts infligés par vos personnages dépendent des paramètres de l'arme qu'ils utilisent. L'efficacité du tir dépend de la distance entre le personnage et son ennemi. Lorsque vous ciblez un ennemi avec un tir au coup par coup, vous verrez deux zones indiquant les {g|Encyclopedia:Range}portées{/g} de tir efficace et maximale de l'arme.
languages.original_text: To attack, first click [LMB] on the {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}single shot{/g} icon on the weapons panel at the bottom of the screen. Hover the cursor over an enemy — a tooltip will appear showing your chances of {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hitting{/g} that enemy and the possible damage you can deal on a successful hit. Click [LMB] on the enemy to fire. The amount of damage your characters deal depends on the parameters of the weapon they are using. The effectiveness of the shot depends on the distance between the character and their enemy — when you target an enemy with a single shot, you will see two areas denoting the weapon's effective and maximum firing {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranges{/g}.

Passez le curseur sur un ennemi. Une infobulle s'affiche alors pour vous indiquer vos chances de {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}toucher{/g} cet ennemi et les dégâts possibles en cas de succès. languages.text: Saldırmak için önce ekranın altındaki silah panelinde bulunan {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}tek atış{/g} simgesine sol fare tuşuyla tıkla. İmleci bir düşmanın üzerine getir. Bir ipucu metni belirerek o düşmana {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vuruş{/g} olasılıklarını ve başarılı bir vuruşta verebileceğin olası hasar miktarını gösterecektir. Ateş etmek için sol fare tuşuna tıkla. Karakterlerinin vereceği hasar miktarları, kullandıkları silahların parametrelerine bağlıdır. Atışın etkililiği, karakterle düşmanı arasındaki mesafeye bağlıdır. Bir düşmanı tek atış saldırısı yapmak için hedeflediğinde, silahın etkililiğini ve maksimum atış {g|Encyclopedia:Range}menzilini{/g} belirten iki alan göreceksin.

Hover the cursor over an enemy — a tooltip will appear showing your chances of {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hitting{/g} that enemy and the possible damage you can deal on a successful hit. Click [LMB] on the enemy to fire. The amount of damage your characters deal depends on the parameters of the weapon they are using. The effectiveness of the shot depends on the distance between the character and their enemy — when you target an enemy with a single shot, you will see two areas denoting the weapon's effective and maximum firing {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranges{/g}.
